page.title: 02ECOLOGY-WEATHER IN WILTSHIRE
page.content: AVERAGE TEMPERATURE VARIES BETWEEN: 16 degrees c in summer to 4 degrees c in the winter. AVERAGE SUNSHINE: Summer - 9 hours daily Winter - 2 hours daily AVERAGE RAINFALL: Summer - 60mm daily Winter - 70mm daily with a monthly frequency of 12 days. GROUND FROST: occurs between October and May. SNOW AND SLEET: Snowfalls in the area are light. The average days when snow or sleet is falling is 25 per year, with snow lying for 10 days. WIND: Wind is mainly force 3 (a gentle breeze), but increases to force 7 (a near gale).
